title: (x) dabs.com logo - ITC Avant Garde Gothic {Dav}
content:
someone can help me find the font for dabs com  
http://www.dabs.com/uk  
thank you
author: hernando

comments.content:
‘dabs’ seems to be a slightly customized ‘ [Avant Garde](http://web.archive.org/web/20051112184220/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&font_categories_search=font_name_search&searchstr=Avant+Garde)’..  
( ‘com’ = ‘ [Avant Garde](http://web.archive.org/web/20051112184220/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&font_categories_search=font_name_search&searchstr=Avant+Garde)’.. )

_( They also use ‘ [Antique Olive](http://web.archive.org/web/20051112184220/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&font_categories_search=font_name_search&searchstr=Antique+Olive)’ for various headers.. :)_
